amendment.description: To amend title 18, United States Code, to protect judges, prosecutors, witnesses, victims, and their family members, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4252 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4252 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S5933-5937; text: CR S5934-5936) To amend title 18, United States Code, to protect judges, prosecutors, witnesses, victims, and their family members, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4252 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reid.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4252 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
